text: Tyler Lee Hoechlin (; born September 11, 1987) is an American actor. He is known for his roles as Michael Sullivan Jr. in the 2002 movie Road to Perdition, Martin Brewer in the television series 7th Heaven (2003-2007), Derek Hale on Teen Wolf (20112014; 2017) and Superman in The CW's Supergirl (20162019) and Superman & Lois (2021present). Hoechlin was born in Corona, California, on September 11, 1987. ==References== ==Other websites== * * UC Irvine player biography Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American child actors Category:American baseball players Category:Sportspeople from California Category:People from Corona, California Category:Actors from Riverside County, California
title: Tyler Hoechlin
